name: AZ Product Slider For WooCommerce
author: AZ Plugins

sections.description:
This plugin will allow you to show your WooCommerce store’s product as a slider anywhere of your website. You can customize everyting using the shortcode and global plugin options.

You can see the slider/carousel demo here : Live Demo

Do you have any idea in your mind to improve this plugin?
Need help to use this plugin?
Please feel free to contact us Here

Features:

  • Shortcode ready
  • Columns support
  • 2 different product styles
  • Category Slider Pro
  • Category Slider Content Position Pro
  • 30+ settings to customize the slider globally
  • All colors are customizable
  • Slider arrow icon change support
  • Show products by type: recent/best_selling/on_sale/top_rated/featured
  • Show product by visibility: visible/shop_only/search_only/hidden_only
  • Show products from single/multiple categories
  • Show products from single/multiple tags
  • Show products by product ids
  • Order products by: date/id/title/rating/popularity/rand/menu_order
  • Responsive ready
  • Works with any themes
  • Multilanguage support
  • WP Multisite support
  • And much more

Pro version is also available. View The Pro Version

More details about the Shortcode Options

Shortcode Use Cases:

Show all products in the slider

[azpswc_product_slider limit="-1"]

Show 5 products in the slider

[azpswc_product_slider limit="8"]

Use Product Style 2

[azpswc_product_slider style="2"]

Show produts in 4 columns

[azpswc_product_slider slides_to_show="4"]

Show featured products

[azpswc_product_slider type="featured"]

Show best selling products

[azpswc_product_slider type="best_selling"]

Show discount/on sale products

[azpswc_product_slider type="on_sale"]

Show top rated products

[azpswc_product_slider type="top_rated"]

Show hidden products

[azpswc_product_slider visibility="hidden_only"]

Show products from specific category by category slug

[azpswc_product_slider categories="clothing,fashion,mens"]

Show products from specific tags by tag slug

[azpswc_product_slider tags="clothing,fashion,mens"]

Show only specific products by product id

[azpswc_product_slider ids="5,75,758"]

Change order of the loaded products

[azpswc_product_slider orderby="popularity"]

Plugin Options

  • Product Item Margin
  • Number Of Items In Desktop
  • Number Of Items In Tablet
  • Number Of Items In Mobile
  • Autoplay
  • Autoplay Timeouts
  • Enable/Disable Dots
  • Enable/Disable Navigation
  • OnSale Label…
  • Onsale Label BG Color
  • Onsale Label Text Color
  • Product Title…
  • Title Text Color
  • Title Font Size
  • Title Margin
  • Product Rating…
  • Rating Color
  • Rating Empty Color
  • Rating Margin
  • Product Price…
  • Previous Price Text Color
  • Previous Price Font Size
  • Current Price Text Color
  • Current Price Font Size
  • Price Margin
  • Add To Cart Button…
  • Button Background Color
  • Button Text Color
  • Button Border Color
  • Button Hover Background Color
  • Button Hover Text Color
  • Button Hover Border Color
  • Button Margin
  • Slider Arrow…
  • Arrow Bg Color
  • Arrow Icon Color
  • Arrow Border Color
  • Arrow Hover BG Color
  • Arrow Hover Icon Color
  • Arrow Prev Class
  • Arrow Next Class
  • Slider Dots…
  • Dots Background Color
  • Dots Border Color
  • Dots Active Background Color
  • Dots Active Border Color
  • Dots Margin

WooCommerce Plugins is required for this plugin.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the “AZ Product Slider For WooCommerce” plugin and get it working.

1) Install

i. Go to the WordPress Dashboard “Add New Plugin” section.

ii. Search For “AZ Product Slider”.

iii. Install, then Activate it.

OR:

i. Unzip (if it is zipped) and Upload az-product-slider folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

ii. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

2) Configure

i. After install and activate the plugin you will get a notice to install WooCommerce Plugin ( If allready have it then do not show any notice. ).

ii. To install the plugin click on the “Button” Install WooCommerce.

iii. A new option page called “AZ Product Options” will be appear in your dashboard under the “Settings” menu

iv. Use the options to customize the product slider and relax!
